wrong.title: We do'nt support such a site!
wrong.description: You accidentally tried to visit a website that we do not support. Sorry, but you'd better return to the home page.

features.work-description: No other free streaming service delivers more content to and from more countries worldwide.
features.no-limits-description: Choose from movies, shows, sports and music documentaries, AMC series, Live TV and more.
features.free-description: Welcome to instant gratification at its best. Watch now without any payment or subscription and end the search for free movie websites.
features.device-description: Stream the good stuff from your favorite devices including Apple, Android, Smart TVs and more.

introduction.title: Watching for free has never been so easy
introduction.description: Register on our website and we will guide you on your path, regardless of what type of device you use.

accordion.title: Frequently Asked Questions
accordion.what-is-description: Just Movie is a streaming service that allows users to enjoy a wide range of award-winning films, series, shows, anime and documentaries across thousands of internet-connected devices.
accordion.watch-description: You can watch on any device, you just need to log in to our application.
accordion.kids-description: Yes, the website mainly supports young people and adults, but there is also a place for children.

validation.password-min-length: Password must be more than 6 characters.

supabase.rate-limiting: To much request. Try again later.
supabase.user-already-registered: User with provided email is already registered.
supabase.not-confirmed: You haven't confirmed your account, check your email.
supabase.forgot-toast: Check your mailbox and follow the steps!
